entry.title: Meet the Nats!!!
entry.summary: This posts talks about natural numbers and cool things you can do with them.

entry.title: Intro to Haskell
entry.summary: This post introduces some basic features of Haskell such as defining types and pattern matching. It does so by putting into Haskell code the basic model of computation for natural numbers and addition that we created earlier.

entry.title: Getting started
entry.summary: This posts explains how to install and use stack to compile and run Haskell programms.

entry.title: A model of computation
entry.summary: This post gives a flavour of the kind of work that mathematicians studying Theory of Computation would do. In it we build from scratch a modelf of computation that allows us to express natural numbers and define addition. On this basis we introduce recursion.

entry.title: A bit of history
entry.summary: This posts narrates how Theory of Computation, and thus computers, were born.

entry.title: Why ???
entry.summary: This post suggests why mathematics and programming are so fascinating and worthy of you spending your time to learn them.
